advisory.description: Vishvananda Ishaya from Nebula reported a denial of service vulnerability in Nova's handling of network source security group policy updates. By performing a large number of server creation operations, the proportion of updates increases quadratically and may overwhelm nova-network such that it is no longer able to service other requests in a timely fashion. Only setups relying on nova-network are affected.
advisory.title: Denial of Service in Nova network source security groups
